description:
MailChimp is the most popular email marketing tool. In this course, you will learn how to use MailChimp for enhancing your email marketing from scratch.

This course is specially designed for MailChimp beginners who haven't used MailChimp before.

At the end of this course, you will be confident to launch your first newsletter/campaign. And you will be able to integrate your MailChimp with your social media for promoting your campaigns.

Course goals are as below.

  • Create your mailing list & update from time to time
  • Design your newsletter/campaign template
  • Set subscribe button on Facebook page & website
  • Design your newsletter signup form
  • Create your first newsletter/campaign
  • Promote your campaign on social media
  • Read campaign report and make use for further email marketing
title: Email Marketing Newsletter: Learn MailChimp from Scratch
